name: unprovable
content:

not able to be proved: In the end, his ideas boil down to no more than unprovable assertions. It's an interesting concept, but unprovable. Compare
provable
More examplesFewer examplesNo names are mentioned, and such stories are unprovable. Some of the charges are true, some unproven and probably unprovable, and others probably wrong. These kind of conspiracy theorists are all too willing to spread unprovable allegations. The claims that had been made about them were checked out and found either to be untrue or unprovable.
